a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global deaths in violent political conflicts over the long run
Data collated from historical records by Peter Brecke. The data seeks to include both combatant and civilian

deaths in
violent political conflicts
due to fighting, disease, and starvation. But records are incomplete,
especially for the distant past and outside of Europe.
